overview: The story of this film is about Morteza Hosseini who is a documentary filmmaker than in 2007 goes into a coma because of an accident on a road and his wife Maryam Sharifi disappears. He, along with his friends Majid Shokri and Yaser Jafari were making a documentary film about aliens and Morteza being in a coma is the beginning of their nightmare.
title: The Story of Mary's Disappearance
